availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Clinton County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Burchett in Clinton County on April 2, 1854. Father of Permelia Burchett, James Burchett, Martha Burchett, Arlena Burchett, John Burchett, Nancy Burchett, and Emily Burchett. Laborer in Clinton County in 1850. Farmer in Clinton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clinton County, District No. 1, p. 161.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clinton County, p. 296.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clinton County, District No. 3, p. 292.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Clinton County Marriages, Film #94027-994058, p. 3.
